body:
This service is for defence witnesses in criminal court cases to make a claim for expenses.

As a defence witness, you can make a claim for:

* travel costs
* accommodation
* meals and refreshments
* financial loss (for example, earnings and childcare costs)

components.html: Find out [how HM Courts and Tribunals Service uses personal information](https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-courts-and-tribunals-service/about/personal-information-charter).

heading: Make a claim for expenses as a defence witness
